submitButton.testsPassingRequired:
**Functional Purpose**: Tooltip message explaining why the submit button is disabled
**UI Location**: Editor → Submit button (tooltip)
**When Users See This**: When hovering over a disabled submit button because tests are failing
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You need to get the tests passing before you can submit your solution"
submitButton.submit:
**Functional Purpose**: Text for the submit button
**UI Location**: Editor → Submit button
**When Users See This**: Always visible, active when tests pass
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Submit"
runTestsButton.youHaveNotMadeChanges:
**Functional Purpose**: Tooltip message explaining why the run tests button is disabled
**UI Location**: Editor → Run Tests button (tooltip)
**When Users See This**: When hovering over a disabled run tests button because no changes have been made
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You have not made any changes since you last ran the tests"
runTestsButton.runTests:
**Functional Purpose**: Text for the run tests button
**UI Location**: Editor → Run Tests button
**When Users See This**: Always visible, active when files have changed
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Run Tests"
